name: Appointment.priority
title: Appointment.priority
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: Used to make informed decisions if needing to re-prioritize
element.definition: The priority of the appointment. Can be used to make informed decisions if needing to re-prioritize appointments. (The iCal Standard specifies 0 as undefined, 1 as highest, 9 as lowest priority).
element.comment: Seeking implementer feedback on this property and how interoperable it is.Using an extension to record a CodeableConcept for named values may be tested at a future connectathon.
